TopicTitle: KSP with VR using Google Cardboard?

Articles.Content: I oddly remember seeing a thread about KSP VR a while back but seeing as it's gone I'll make a new one especially since this one might be a bit different. What I'm after is some way to use my Google Cardboard with KSP on my PC so I can get cheap VR. Even if I have to have my phone physical connected to my PC via USB I'm willing to do it, I'm just wondering what's the suggested method. I have done some reading online and the solutions seem dubious, so I'm uncertain as to the legitimacy of some of their methods so I come to this community and ask what do you suggest I do to get my Iphone Google Cardboard to be KSP VR?
maybe this is something for you: http://trinusvr.com/
